definition: variant of 叮嚀|叮咛[ding1 ning2]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: I killed two hours watching TV.
sentences.chinese: 我看了兩個小時的電視以丁寧時間。

sentences.english: She repeatedly urged her son not to tell anyone about it.
sentences.chinese: 她一再丁寧兒子不要和任何人講這事。

sentences.english: We are going to stay on the train for 22 hours. How will we kill the time?
sentences.chinese: 咱們將在火車上呆2二個鐘頭，怎麼丁寧時間呢？

sentences.english: Mother kept on telling me to be careful when outside.
sentences.chinese: 母親反覆丁寧我，出門一定要注意安全。

definition: long-term considerations/to take the long view
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
to apologize for an offense/to offer one's apology for a fault
section chief (of an administrative unit)/head (of a department)
cap badge (official sign of rank in Qing dynasty)
Takeshima (Korean Dokdo 獨島|独岛[Du2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan
